com.jfoenix.transitions

Class JFXAnimationTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
      • com.jfoenix.transitions.JFXAnimationTimer

  • public class JFXAnimationTimer
extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
    Custom AnimationTimer that can be created the same way as a timeline, however it doesn't behave the same yet. it only animates in one direction, it doesn't support animation 0 -> 1 -> 0.5
    Since:
    2017-09-21
